title: Time Value of Money: Enhancing Practical Application Skills Through Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Accounting Principles and Understanding of Financial Products
context.additional_context: Case-based design for workplace application, incorporating digital tool-supported collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can calculate future value after 5 years using compound interest formulas with 90% accuracy
Learners can write present value analysis reports applying the concept of discount rates
Learners can accurately evaluate NPV (Net Present Value) through investment decision-making in a gamification simulation with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
